name: ケルトの聖戦
summary:
Celtic Tales: Balor of the Evil Eye (ケルトの聖戦, Keruto no Seisen, translated as "Holy Battle of the Celts") is a role-playing strategy game inspired from Irish mythology. It is a part of Koei's Imagination series.
Stieg Hedlund designed the game while Eric Heberling provided the music score.
info:
• 中文名: 魔眼邪神之赛尔特传说
